name: Silver Spider Chapter Zero
description:
Prologue of the Silver Spider

Silver Spider Chapter Zero is a visual novel game with point and click exploration made in the ren'py engine. Play the prologue of the Silver Spider and see how it all starts. Inspired by a certain famous web crawler and their characters.

This is a short prologue so there's not too much content. I'm mainly making this to practice ren'py and to see if I could "finish" a small project before tackling something bigger. There are some incomplete elements in the custom menu but the entire prologue is done. Let me know what you think and lend me support if you'd like.

Cheers!


Features

• Roughly 20-25 minutes of content

• Point and click style investigation

• Mystery and drama visual novel at its core

• Quick and snappy dialogue

• Art, audio design, story, writing, and coding by me (SilverTeeShirt)

• Raw audio and music from free sources credited in game

Future plans not included here

• 4 fully fledged chapters with an intricate story

• Quick puzzle like combat with light RPG mechanics

• Suits, gear, and an inventory system

• Reputation, relationship, and toxicity system

• Large cast of superheroes and villains

• Adult content 18+
